name: TapPlease
description:
Take a turn on time not to fall into the chasm.
Tide over the obstacles, defeat the robots which try to intercept you from reaching the finish line. Collect all the chests, find all the puzzles to open all the superheroes. You can do it!

*** WHY YOU’LL LOVE TAP PLEASE ***

• Open over 10 super heroes.
• Tide over different obstacles on your way.
• Compete with friends, break all the records.
• Defeat all the enemies.
• Enjoy many different worlds.

Be attentive and never give up.


Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at support at support@lifeandgame.com
